lines: !throw You are not a registered player!
!throw You may only use this command within your own player channel.
!throw You have already taken a card from the Merchants.
!throw You really shouldn't grab even more cards when you're supposed to be decreasing your card count. ({!tag {me} must_discard} left)
!throw You may only choose a Common card.
!throw You may only choose an unfused card.
